subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Quite contrary to the notion that baseball would be much better off if Barry Bonds disappeared, the game not only deserves the Bonds denouement, it needs it for the sake of a raised consciousness.
snippet: Quite contrary to the notion that baseball would be much better off if Barry Bonds disappeared, the game not only deserves the Bonds denouement, it needs it for the sake of a raised consciousness.
